SEARCH
Package Service

Class FileLoanRepository

java.lang.Object
Service.FileLoanRepository
public class FileLoanRepository extends Object
Repository class for managing loans stored in a file. Provides methods to borrow, return, and query loans.

    • borrowItem

      public Loan borrowItem(User user, MediaItem item)
      Borrows a media item for a user and creates a new loan.
      Parameters:
      user - the user borrowing the item
      item - the media item to borrow
      Returns:
      the created Loan
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if user or item is null
      IllegalStateException - if item is not available

    • returnItem

      public boolean returnItem(String loanId, LocalDate returnDate)
      Returns a borrowed item by loan ID.
      Parameters:
      loanId - the loan ID
      returnDate - the return date (null = today)
      Returns:
      true if return successful, false otherwise

      Returns:

      list of overdue loans
